body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Alan Smith and the customer's name is Catherine Morgan.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, welcome to MetaCar! My name is Alan Smith, and I'm here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alan, I’m Catherine Morgan. I need some help with my car rental.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Catherine! How can I assist you with your car rental today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit anxious because my reservation seems to be missing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be frustrating. Let's sort this out together. Can I start by getting your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you please provide me with your phone number, just to verify your identity?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's three one two, five six seven, eight nine zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I have your information. Let me check your reservation status right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I really appreciate your help, Alan.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Catherine! Thank you for your patience. I’m all set now and will resolve this shortly. Thank you for your time today!
